stochastic_function: lambda investment_decision, current_savings, market_risk, economic_conditions: {1: 0.6 if (investment_decision == 'invest' and current_savings == 'high' and market_risk == 'low' and economic_conditions == 'favorable') else 0.2 if (investment_decision == 'invest' and current_savings == 'high' and market_risk == 'low' and economic_conditions == 'neutral') else 0.3 if (investment_decision == 'invest' and current_savings == 'high' and market_risk == 'medium' and economic_conditions == 'favorable') else 0.1, 0: 0.2 if (investment_decision == 'invest' and current_savings == 'high' and market_risk == 'low' and economic_conditions == 'favorable') else 0.6 if (investment_decision == 'invest' and current_savings == 'high' and market_risk == 'low' and economic_conditions == 'neutral') else 0.4 if (investment_decision == 'invest' and current_savings == 'high' and market_risk == 'medium' and economic_conditions == 'favorable') else 0.2, -1: 0.2 if (investment_decision == 'invest' and current_savings == 'high' and market_risk == 'low' and economic_conditions == 'favorable') else 0.2 if (investment_decision == 'invest' and current_savings == 'high' and market_risk == 'low' and economic_conditions == 'neutral') else 0.3 if (investment_decision == 'invest' and current_savings == 'high' and market_risk == 'medium' and economic_conditions == 'favorable') else 0.7}
